name: product-list-06
description: Mixed grid layout combining promotional discount cards with product cards, featuring rating badges, wishlist checkboxes, category badges, add-to-cart buttons, and special offer sections with emoji avatars

files.content:
import ProductList from '@/components/shadcn-studio/blocks/product-list-06/product-list-06'

  },

]

const ProductListPage = () => {
  return <ProductList productCards={productCardsData} />
}

export default ProductListPage
